subject: Lacrosse
Blacks
Race and Ethnicity
Discrimination
Minorities
lead_paragraph: The popularity of lacrosse has increased, but the diversity in the sport has lagged behind. Several minority players have said they have experienced situations or heard remarks related to race.
snippet: The popularity of lacrosse has increased, but the diversity in the sport has lagged behind. Several minority players have said they have experienced situations or heard remarks related to race.
